answers.answer:
We would like to inform you that Startup India does not offer any loan-related incentives. DPIIT-recognised Startups can access the below links to explore funding opportunities:
a) SIDBI Fund of Funds
b) Government Schemes on Startup India portal
c) State Startup Policies on Startup India Portal.
d) Startup India Seed Fund Scheme
d) Participate in Programs and Challanges

To know more about the Startup India benefits, visit this link.
To get your startup recognized under Startup India and avail benefits, visit this link
To know more about funding, visit Funding guide for Startups in the Resources menu.
